resources.string: Permanent Account N​umber (PAN) is a ten-digit alphanumeric number, issued in the form of a laminated card by the Income Tax Department, to ​any "person" who applies for it or to whom the department allots the number
Online Application - An online application can be made from the website of UTIITSL or NSDL
2) Through PAN Application Center - Application for PAN can be submitted at the PAN Application center
By using the Online PAN Verification facility, one can know/verify the Permanent Account ​Number (PAN). This facility is referred to as "PAN Verification" or "Know Your PAN
Income-tax department has an electronic portal for lodging PAN Grievances through Aayakar Sampark Kendra..

string.b: What is the validity of PAN ?

string.b: Can a Person hold more than one PAN ?

string.name: pan_deductor
string.b: ​Should I intimate my PAN to deductor ?

resources.string: ​​Is it mandatory to file return of income after getting PAN?
